pt: {sc}get{/sc}, {sc}obtain{/sc}, {sc}procure{/sc}, {sc}secure{/sc} mean to bring into one's possession. {sc}get{/sc} applies broadly to any manner of gaining possession
. {sc}obtain{/sc} may suggest getting by planning or effort
. {sc}procure{/sc} may suggest getting something through a formal or set procedure
. {sc}secure{/sc} may suggest safe or lasting possession
